command.run.cooldown: You have to wait %s to use the command again!
command.run.invaild: You have to fill a argument.
basic.say.description: Say something you want to say -> ([json builder](https://glitchii.github.io/embedbuilder/?username=FDYBoT&guitabs=title,fields,description&avatar=https://cdn.discordapp.com/avatars/977542041670152212/cf54c7c185fa433014bfd2ec79df0f21.png&data=JTdCJTIyZW1iZWQlMjIlM0ElN0IlMjJ0aXRsZSUyMiUzQSUyMkxvcmVtJTIwaXBzdW0lMjIlMkMlMjJkZXNjcmlwdGlvbiUyMiUzQSUyMkRvbG9yJTIwc2l0JTIwYW1ldC4uLiUyMiUyQyUyMmNvbG9yJTIyJTNBMzkxMjklN0QlN0Q=))
basic.say.usage: Say something you want to say. supports raw ctx.
basic.say.error.invaildparams: there is a error when sending a embed, try again and check is the embed legal or not.
basic.say.error.noargs: what do you want to say??
basic.replacer.testify:
holy shit: <holy_shit>
holy fuck (this should gives "en"): <lang>
try array: %0%, %s, %1%, %2%, %s, %s
try escape: %\, <\, \>
basic.help.ext_description: do `%sh <command>` to see a description of a command you need more info on! For example `%sh hitokoto`.
basic.help.notfound: I can't find that command. Please verify that the command exists before trying again.
basic.lang.current:
Your current language on the bot is %s.
currently %s langs available: %s
basic.lang.set: I have set your language to %s!
basic.hitokoto.description: get a quote from internet that looked inspiring. (or it just make senses)
moderation.buttonrole.error.noperms: You do not have sufficent permission to run this command!
moderation.buttonrole.error.botnoperms: well, i got no permission to set roles. please give me permission to set roles.
moderation.buttonrole.error.cantedit: well, i dont think i can edit that message and add a button on it, that message probably isnt mine. use `%ssay` to let me say something btw.
